product_name: The North Face Boone Woven Shirt - Men's
long_description: Rely on the Boone Woven shirt from The North Face to deliver moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance on the trail and comfort when you're hanging around the campsite. Durable nylon/polyester blend protects against abrasion when you're bushwhacking or scrambling in the backcountry. Snap-down front makes it easy to put on and take off so you can regulate your temperature. On sunny days, flip the collar up to shade your neck from direct sunlight. Two low-profile chest pockets with rip-and-stick closures give you a place to stash cash, keys or a small compass.
short_description: Rely on the Boone Woven shirt from The North Face to deliver moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance on the trail and comfort when you're hanging around the campsite.
